about_the_game:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Spell Templates


The Spell Templates Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This map package is specifically designed to emulate many spells' descriptions while maintaining a clear understanding of which spaces on the battlefield are affected. Use the built-in color picker when using a spell template to adjust the color and opacity of the spell's area of effect to customize or enhance the experience.

This pack includes:

  • Brushes to paint out walls of fire, ice, thorns, and more. Have the freedom to control the shape, orientation, and length of the spells in play
  • Decorations include over 50 spell templates with many popular spells in their correct shape and size. Cone effects are represented in both straight and diagonal orientations for square gridded maps.
  • Black Tentacles: 20' square
  • Bruning Hands: 15' cone
  • Call Lightning Storm: 60' radius
  • Circle of Death: 60' radius
  • Cloudkill: 20' radius
  • Color Spray: 15' cone
  • Cone of Cold: 60' cone
  • Darkness: 15' radius
  • Earthquake: 100' radius/ 60' radius
  • Entangle: 20' square
  • And many more
  • Generic effects in all shapes and sizes designed to be easily adaptable with the color picker

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.[/h2]

This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Spell Templates


The Spell Templates Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This map package is specifically designed to emulate many spells' descriptions while maintaining a clear understanding of which spaces on the battlefield are affected. Use the built-in color picker when using a spell template to adjust the color and opacity of the spell's area of effect to customize or enhance the experience.

This pack includes:

  • Brushes to paint out walls of fire, ice, thorns, and more. Have the freedom to control the shape, orientation, and length of the spells in play
  • Decorations include over 50 spell templates with many popular spells in their correct shape and size. Cone effects are represented in both straight and diagonal orientations for square gridded maps.

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
